I was wondering if anyone else here still plays Sim City 4, or SimCity 4: Rush Hour (or the Deluxe Edition which comes with the expansion integrated).

It's an excellent game, and available on Good Old Games. Maxis really broke the mould with it- their later Sim City games ("Sim Societies" and "Sim City") were TERRIBLE by comparison...

Regards,

Northstar

Ah, yes. Simcity 4... one of the best EA games that I have ever played that wasn't Red Alert 2...

Very very enjoyable and fun game. I still play it, although not as much as FTL, KSP, or Fo3/F:NV. I have 2 boxed special editions or whatever they're called, and the disks are surprisingly still ok.
